title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Learning Design: Practitioner-Based Instructional Systems Design (ISD) Program Improvement Process

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Derive at least three improvement strategies for language education program design using the practitioner-based ISD model (OISD)
Revise and apply instructional design processes at least twice based on formative assessment results
Reach consensus on at least five common definitions (terminology/processes) when designing educational systems through team-based collaboration
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
